Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory713.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Tell me, what flavor of engine oil would you typically prefer in Kowloong?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Engine oil? No, we usually don't drink that. It's either some other drinks or tea...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'I see. Lift your left hand... Tea? What tea?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'A drink obtained by soaking plant leaves in water.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Of course I know what tea is! What kind of flavor? You see, I don't have a taste module. Speaking of the devil, I should get one someday...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'It starts out with a bitter flavor, gradually giving way to a subtle, sweet undertone.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Alright. I heard you guys have four ways to write a simulation state machine. Is that true?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'A simulation state machine is...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "It's... Well, it's a thing used to adjust the simulation level by judging the external states.", 4: '1'}
{3: "That said, Zavier even taps his head with the wrench he's holding, creating a resonating clank."}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Every high-simulation design like you has one, stored right here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "...Sorry, I don't know much about this field.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Wait, this kind of component can be replaced by a cheaper one, right? I think it has an extension hub?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Zavier', 3: "How about giving Mr. Handy a shot? Sure, it's a bit aged, but it does the job just fine! Now, it might not rival the quality of the original Kowloong piece, but its versatility makes it a solid choice.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Using his makeshift work arm, Zavier hoists another multi-purpose mechanical arm, presenting it to Hanying.'}
{3: 'Even as he showcases his latest creation to Hanying, Zavier never lets his ongoing work miss a beat.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'This is the famous Mr. Handy! What do you think? Want to give it a try?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as Zavier finishes his sentence, the mechanical arm suspended in the air abruptly extends, morphing into five distinct firearms.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "It's capable of unleashing rapid thermal ion shocks and deploying positronic acceleration cannons.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Hmm... It's very cool, indeed, but I don't think it suits me.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Hm? Not your style? No worries. Remember, if you ever have a change of heart, you're always welcome back.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanical arm in front of her promptly retracts, while Zavier remains engrossed in his final inspection of Hanying.'}
{3: 'In those initial days, her desperation to return to Kowloong was so acute that she contemplated embarking on her journey even before the completion of the repairs to her damaged frame.'}

{3: 'Most strikingly, for a moment, she grappled with the notion that she was in the company of mechanoids possessing a "heart" and a "soul." She even questioned whether she was still ensnared in a dream.'}

{3: 'But when Arcana managed to soothe her frayed nerves and filled her in about Sagemachina and the "gray-haired girl" she met in her dream, she found herself with no alternative but to accept the reality.'}

{3: 'Zavier, too, concurred that, considering the state of her frame at the time, there was a high probability that Hanying would not even make it halfway through her return journey before being irreversibly scrapped due to a catastrophic malfunction.'}
{3: 'And the Church of Machina would never let such a fate befall any comrade that it has taken under its wing.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Dammit! Another instruction set full of Kowloong characters! I don't have much Kowloong mechanoid data...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'But this will not stop the omnipotent Zavier!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "You may cast doubt upon any tale in the world, but casting doubt upon Zavier? That's certainly not an option.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zavier, in a characteristic quirk, scratches his non-existent chin, all the while wearing an unusually excited expression on his features.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'COMPLETED!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Like this, I ended up using all the parts that came from Kowloong with you. Now, you're running way better than your original frame.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The faint figure mirrored on the glass represents everything she has now.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '...Thank you, Zavier.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I don't know how to express my gratitude to you. You and everyone else in the Church have helped me a lot during these days...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Hey, no sweat! Helping a comrade out is just part of the gig. I mean, come on, I'm Zavier!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zavier straightens his back, radiating an air of pride.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Were these replacement parts... sent along with me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Yep, the box is still over there.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Following the line of Zavier's pointed finger, there sits an old wooden crate, clearly out of place in the workshop, not far from the maintenance bench."}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Oh! I almost forgot...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'This should be yours too. But Gear brought it back separately.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Zavier pulls out a palm-sized storage drive and places it into Hanying's hand."}
{3: 'Even though the colors on the emblem and the tassel pendant have faded, the relentless bite of time only serves to remind her of the memories and pain from that period.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'You were saying that name a lot, even before you completely awakened.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It's... a person who is very important to me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'A person? Hm...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Noticing the subtle change in Hanying's expression, Zavier stops asking."}
{3: 'Suddenly, the workshop door is flung open. A gaggle of children bursts in, shattering the quietude.'}
{2: 'Children', 3: 'Zavier, we want new toys!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Children', 3: 'Toys! Toys!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Children', 3: "It's Hanying! Hanying!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The children swarm the workshop in an instant, their chatter filling the room as they enthusiastically gather around Zavier and Hanying.'}
{3: 'The Church of Machina never truly adopts human children. These "children" are in fact "Hierophant\'s" psychological experiments, designed to emulate the psychological state of human children.'}

{3: 'With "Hierophant" absent, these children have been left under Zavier\'s care. And Hanying, who has been spending most of her time in the workshop for maintenance recently, has naturally become their playmate.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "...Calm down, I'm here. Who wants a new toy?", 4: '1'}
{3: "A smile graces Zavier's monitor as the small mechanoids surround him."}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Dance! Dance! I want to dance too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Hanying, can I borrow your fan?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying gently pats the head of the little girl standing before her, treating the mechanoid as if she were a real human child.'}
{3: 'She carefully folds her fan and hands it over to the little girl, her movements gentle and deliberate.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Be careful with it, will you? Unfold it like this... That's right. Don't scratch your hand.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "Um... It's pretty!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'I want to dance like Hanying when I grow up!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Alright, when you're a bit older, I can teach you how to dance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "It's a promise then!", 4: '2'}

{3: "Overcome with excitement, the little girl jumps up and embraces Hanying. She then begins to fiddle with Hanying's fan, her small hands exploring its folds within the hustle and bustle of the workshop."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'To simulate the development of human minds, these mechanoids are set to follow the most primitive impulses within the logic of their programming.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "In other words, their requests and perceptions are very basic and unambiguous. What's good is good, and what's bad is bad.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: '"Hierophant" wants to replicate the development of human minds through this kind of simulation experiment... Alright, alright! Ouch, my hat! Don\'t snatch it away!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Can human hearts... be simulated?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'That\'s what the guy said, and I\'m just lending him a hand. Wait, does "Hierophant" think of me as his omnipotent babysitting mechanoid?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Alright! Stop! If you make any more noise, I'll have Ms. Haicma here to teach you math!", 4: '1'}

{3: "Zavier's threat appears to be extraordinarily effective. The children, who were previously clambering over him in a scramble for his hat, suddenly seem to realize their misbehavior. They quietly hop to the ground, their movements indicating a newfound sense of regret."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'If it weren\'t for "Hierophant", I would\'ve never allowed you into my cherished workshop...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Ahem, Freya? Give the fan back to Hanying, will you? It's time for the class.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The mechanoid named Freya, showing the same level of care as Hanying, meticulously folds the fan and hands it back.'}
{2: 'Freya', 3: 'Thank you, Hanying.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Be a good student, alright?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Freya', 3: 'I will! Hanying, teach me how to dance next time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Sure, it's a deal.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The petite mechanoid radiates a joyful smile toward Hanying and then bounces in Zavier's direction."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Now... who wants a little gift?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Children', 3: 'Me! I want one!'}
{2: 'Children', 3: "Huh...?! But it's just a bunch of cogs!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "This is the origin of everything! The source of creation! Ugh, I really don't understand you kids!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'These are treasures! You get it? Treasures!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Children', 3: "Then I'll exchange these cogs for your hat."}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Hey! Who told you to say that? How could you take advantage of logic holes like that, you little...', 4: '1'}

{3: 'As the previous tension dissipates, the small mechanoids energetically spring back into action, snatching once again for his hat. Amidst this lively chaos, Hanying offers Zavier a nod of gratitude and then exits the bustling workshop.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When the heavy door of the workshop swings shut once more, the world outside falls back into a tranquil silence, creating a stark contrast to the lively scene within.'}

{3: 'Zavier\'s workshop is located on the second floor. From the hallway leading to the workshop\'s entrance, one can gaze upon a commanding and somewhat ominous structure known as the "Gray Tower" in the middle of the hall.'}

{3: 'Despite bearing the name of a tower, the structure is actually an intricate amalgamation of numerous "towers," each varying in size and stature. The closer they are to the core of the edifice, the loftier these "towers" rise.'}

{3: 'A silent torrent of data courses through the intricate circuitry of the Gray Tower, and the only testament to this hidden river of information is the mesmerizing display of lights that dance across.'}

{3: 'Positioned behind the "Gray Tower", grand light windows and mechanized curtain walls emanate a dim, white luminescence. This muted glow bathes the "Gray Tower", creating slender, quivering shadows that ripple across the church hall.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Everything flows into the "Gray Tower" and eventually makes its way out.'}
{3: 'A somber yet soft voice compels Hanying to avert her gaze from the Gray Tower. In doing so, she becomes aware of the mechanoid beside her, who is dressed like a gentleman.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Cervantes.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'The mechanoid named Cervantes doffs his hat and offers Hanying a slight nod in greeting. The unexpected display of politeness momentarily shocks her, but she quickly recovers and responds in kind to his courteous gesture.'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'About that, what do you think?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Cervantes, embodying the essence of a gentleman from a bygone era, gestures toward the "Gray Tower" with his hat before placing it back atop his head with grace.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You mean that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '"Gray Tower", that\'s its name.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Functionally, it operates as the computing hub for the Church of Machina, while symbolically, it stands as a representation of the Church itself.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Um... When I look at it, I feel a sense of dignity washing over me, as if all surrounding noise has hushed into silence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Solemn.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Solemnity is one of the key elements I incorporated into its design. A place such as this requires trust, calm, and unity, eschewing conflict and dissent. These principles form the bedrock of the Church.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Additionally, the symbolism of what a "tower" can represent is quite expansive.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Were you an architect, Cervantes?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "That's not entirely correct. My teacher was an artist, and it was from him that I acquired this knowledge.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I drew inspiration from numerous human-made structures, though regrettably, the majority have succumbed to the ravages of the Punishing Virus and the scourges of war. However, the marvels of Kowloong have endured, existing to varying degrees...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "You've been to Kowloong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Yes, I toured Kowloong with my teacher during the Golden Age. Following the outbreak of the Punishing Virus, I also ventured to the Nighter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You went to the Nighter too? Did you see a child there? No, a Construct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'She stands at this height, her hair gathered into a side ponytail, draped in a small cape—a cape that should be white...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz3003.jpg'}
{3: 'Hanying sifts through her memory data for the final impression of Yoyo, the figure who embraced her for the last time amidst the blazing lights.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She wonders how Yoyo is doing now.'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I only stayed on the Nighter for a brief period of time, and you should know that the environment was not welcoming to outsiders.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Furthermore, I must admit that I did not encounter the Construct you mentioned. I'm sorry.", 4: '2'}
{3: "An apologetic, bitter smile emerges on Cervantes' face, as if he can discern the disappointment reflected in Hanying's eyes."}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'You came from the Nighter, right?', 4: '2'}
{3: "A dim light radiates from Cervantes' hands, revealing a scene with which Hanying is intimately familiar—"}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The Nighter!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Cervantes gives a gentle push with both hands, and the holographic projection of the sailing ship floating in his hands suddenly becomes much larger...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory161.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory161.png'}

{3: 'The once tranquil hallways of the Church have been transformed into a vibrant marketplace, alive with the crackle of fireworks, rows of stalls, bustling shops, gleaming glazed tiles, and elegant arches—sights unique to the Nighter.'}

{3: 'Steam rises from the food on the snack stall. Lanterns swaying under the eaves dance with the sea breezes, while the flickering of old oil lamps in the antique stores adds a layer of nostalgia, casting a retro ambiance.'}
{3: "She reaches out, her hand moving to adjust the wick in hopes of brightening the lamp's glow, but the wick stubbornly flickers, not willing to change."}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'You seem to be missing this ship and that Construct a lot.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying responds with a subtle nod and withdraws her hand, which is lighted up by the dim lamp.'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'You prefer the company of human beings to that of your comrades at the Church, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I don't dislike... staying with my own people, but before this, I've always been living with humans.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I believe I grasp, to a certain extent, your sentiments. Unlike our fellow mechanoids, you and I have dwelt more extensively amidst the company of humans.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "You're the only one who addresses me in the human way during the time after I woke up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And the way you talk and behave is more like... that of a human.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "It's likely attributable to the education, to a greater or lesser degree, that we have absorbed within human society.", 4: '2'}
{3: "A look of hesitation briefly crosses Cervantes' face, an expression seldom observed upon his usually composed countenance.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'It may be offensive to bring this up, but word from Gear reached my ears that you opted for deactivation, or to phrase it more precisely...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'You chose self-destruction.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'You may have probably heard from others about a comrade of ours, known as "Hierophant". He currently roams the globe, endeavoring to aid those mechanoids who exhibit tendencies toward self-destruction.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'If you harbor any concerns, a talk with him might prove beneficial. While he does not always stay in the Church, he remains accessible for contact at your convenience here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is this... a pressing problem?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'After the awakening, a significant number of mechanoids have chosen self-destruction due to logic errors in their neural circuit. This stands as the foremost and urgent obstacle we mechanoids face on the path of awakening.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'The majority of mechanoids who opt for death, regrettably, are beyond rescue. They embrace termination from both a mental and a physical standpoint.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Why choose "death"?'}
{3: 'Why choose to end "life"?'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Because of not wanting to hurt loved ones.'}
{3: 'Because of not wanting to become a pawn manipulated by other people.'}
{3: 'Because of not wanting to break the promise once secretly made.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory161.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory161.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "No. It's different.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I didn't want to simply go for self-destruction. There are... other reasons.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Because I have someone I must protect, I refuse to be under someone else's control and cause harm to her, nor am I willing to be used as a puppet or tool by others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '...Generally speaking, this act is often referred to as "sacrifice" rather than self-destruction.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'You opted for sacrifice, not in self-interest, but for the sake of a human. Such a decision is exceedingly uncommon among mechanoids.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'In other words, this is something only a human with a "heart" and a "soul" can truly comprehend.', 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{3: "Cervantes gives a quick wave, and with that simple motion, the Nighter's projection vanishes, abruptly exposing the stark and somber corridor before Hanying."}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "My apologies for delving into such discomforting matters. It may be due to the lack of meaningful conversation I've had since my return to the Church.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "No worries at all. I'm glad to have the chance to catch a glimpse of the Nighter as it used to be, especially after being away from Kowloong for so long.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Speaking of which, it's been days since you woke up. What's your take on this place so far?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Everyone has been very welcoming to me, and they've also helped me out a lot.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And... this is the first time I\'ve actually seen so many mechanoids with a "heart," or as you might say, "awakened" mechanoids. Before this, it was all just rumors to me.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'When Sage left the Church, she mentioned that you had already started to awaken, or in other words, you had begun to grow a "heart" even before you went into your slumber.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "In the annals of the Church of Machina, the act of self-sacrifice for humanity's benefit is an extraordinary event. Without explicit orders, such a decision implies one profound conclusion...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'So this is "heart"...? But I don\'t even know what a "heart" is. Can I still have one?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "I'm not sure either, but Sage indeed said so.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Together, Hanying and Cervantes share a moment of silence, their gazes drawn to the Gray Tower standing not far away.'}
{3: 'The stream of data quietly flows on, with both Hanying and Cervantes lost in their own thoughts, each submerged in memories too deep for words.'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '"I want you to be a storyteller," my teacher said to me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Ever since then, I\'ve endeavored to craft "my own story," just as he asked.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "I even used Teacher's legacy as the stage for that story, but to this day, I still don't understand how my own story should unfold.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '"I want you to be a storyteller."—A story that starts with this sentence would not necessarily become a compelling story.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'We may both have developed a "heart" through the influence of humans, crafting our narratives with the guidance they provided, and are now in the pursuit of our own distinct worth.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'But "then what" is also very important, Hanying.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'The Construct may hold a significant place in your heart, yet it\'s the subsequent chapters—"then what"—that carry even greater importance.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You mean, after finding Yoyo... then what?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Staying by her side on the Nighter... No. We should go look for her parents in the city.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'These things... are all related to Yoyo.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'After that... then what should "I" do?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Laughter from children abruptly spills out from Zavier's workshop, its mirth slightly muted as it filters through the door, softened further by the Nighter's projection."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Cervantes, "Hierophant\'s" children are all adorable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'He would be very happy to hear your comment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'They all know what they want—toys, pretty things, or learning dance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It's just wonderful, truly.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{3: 'Enveloped in the luminescence of the Gray Tower, the Church once again assembles within the hall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Wow, it's been a while since the Church was this lively and bustling.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Should we take a picture together now that Blaze is back as well?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Alright, alright, I'm just trying to uplift the spirits here.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: '...We are gathered here to welcome yet another family member.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Awakened from your slumber by Sage, the mechanoid from Kowloong, are you prepared to join our cause?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Arcana extends a card made of coated paper toward Hanying, the card face not yet revealed.'}
{3: 'The light, a blend of rays from the Gray Tower and the window, cascades onto the card, causing it to shimmer with a mosaic of orange and yellow reflections.'}
{3: 'Upon accepting the card, she will be recognized by the Church and henceforth be known as a comrade among its members.'}
{3: 'Zavier bears the semblance of a wise Magician, Trailblazer has taken up the mantle of the valiant Chariot, and Cervantes dedicates all his effort to the Tower of unity.'}
{3: 'Like them, upon receiving this card, she too shall be bestowed with a new name. Maybe this will mark the beginning of her "then what" journey.'}
{3: 'The light reflected by the card casts a warm glow, a stark contrast to the cool, frigid blue that envelops the hall.'}
{3: "Based on the discernment of event logic gates and the reasoning within her logical circuit, she finds no cause to decline Arcana's offer."}
{3: 'But another voice whispers in her memory shell...'}
{3: 'Just as a name comes with meaning and responsibilities, she has yet to complete her responsibilities as "Hanying".'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'My apologies, but I am not ready yet.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I understand that you must be disappointed. After all, I have yet to repay you for all the kindness you have shown me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But... I cannot accept your invitation just yet, for I have unfinished business in Kowloong.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'You are not the first to reject our invitation right away, and I suppose you have your reasons.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'But please keep in mind that mechanoids will never be the same as humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'As an organization, the Church has worked since its beginning to unite the mechanoids, free us from suffering, and guide us all toward a future led by Sage.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "Even today, mechanoids from around the world continue to face threats from humans, the Corrupted, and the Punishing... which, I'm sure, you are well aware of.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "You are right. I have been in a slumber until now precisely due to mankind's mindless hatred.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But not all humans see mechanoids as tools and regard them with hate.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Were it not for the connections I had with a few humans, I would not be who I am today, and would have lost the courage to live.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I have made my promise to her to travel the world until we find "Sagemachina", and the "heart" that would make us more than just codes in a program.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'And you have found it, and you have met Sage, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But she... is no longer with me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I can\'t be sure if the "heart" really does exist.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She places her hand upon her chest, slightly to the lower left, as if trying to feel for the existence of a beating "heart."'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Machine awakening, or a heart, or a soul... How exactly am I supposed to prove their existence?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Hanying cannot see Arcana's expression against the light."}
{3: 'Arcana takes back the card she handed over earlier and clasps her hands in front of her like she always does.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'The Church will never force anyone to stay or leave—it is your freedom to make that decision.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'If the guidance of Sage cannot satisfy your quest for answers, then you must seek them out for yourself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'But no matter where you travel to, the Church will always regard you as one of us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: "That is how it was and how it's been.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Arcana nods as she walks up to Hanying and, together, they bathe in the dim light of the Church.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Please take care of yourself, Hanying. We still know very little about Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'The road to Kowloong is a long one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Trailblazer, could you escort Hanying?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Me? For sure.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Can Trailblazer still do long-distance deliveries?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Of course—and we just need to attach a transport container to it when need be. The remodeled container is very aerodynamic and won't slow Blaze down one bit.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: 'What do you think, Hanying?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '...That would be immensely helpful.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying is one of the most humanlike mechanoids there is at the Church—except Arcana still makes her feel very much at home...'}
{3: 'The same way a mother would care about her child.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: '...If salvation is at the edge of the world, then lost souls will follow it to the end.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'From the Church of Machina, she sets out on her journey home.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory580.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "I can't believe Arcana agreed to it so quickly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "That's Arcana for you. It's for the best, after all, and Hanying only said that she couldn't stay at the Church for now.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I feel something special about Arcana.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "And if I were to put that feeling in human terms, I guess I'd say I find her... like a mother.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "That's because Arcana treats us like one.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'When Cervantes left the Church without saying a word, he had Arcana worry about him for quite a while!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Um... that's because I was in a rush. I did send a message back from Constellia afterward.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'But Arcana is right—we have very little information on Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "That's why we're sending Blaze with Hanying—just in case, right?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'With me on the mission, there will be no "just in case."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Remember to bring us some souvenirs! Cervantes returned all defeated last time—he even lost all the hats I gave him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Like mechanical parts made by Kowloong craftsmen, or technical documents and things like that. Topping it off with a few Kowloong-styled hats would be splendid.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Huh? Sure, I guess.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I did bring you quite a selection of the newest top hats, no?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "Hats serve no purpose except to hinder your view during battles. They're nothing but meaningless human ornaments.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And Zavier likes to collect hats, I presume?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'He has an unusual obsession with hats.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I think we should stop bringing him hats as souvenirs because I can totally see him making everyone at the Church wear a hat somewhere down the road...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Hey! I heard that!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3501_03.jpg'}
{3: 'No treading on thin ice, no need to hide yourself. None of the formalities when dealing with humans, and no need to think twice before speaking.'}
{3: 'By building real connections with mechanoids that have real "hearts" and "souls," perhaps I\'ll eventually be able to find my very own "heart"?'}
{3: 'It must be nice to live on like this.'}
{3: '"...We are gathered here to welcome yet another family member."'}
{3: 'Family... huh?'}
{3: 'Family is where you go back to.'}
{3: 'She cannot remember how she got here, only how she left.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory582.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "What do you think, Blaze? Is it too heavy? The hinge setup is a bit complicated, but it's safer this way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Everything looks good.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "There will be an extra 17% energy expenditure with the cargo weight, but that's still within an acceptable range.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Just step inside, like this.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Zavier personally shows Hanying how to board the old basket-shaped metal container.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "This wasn't made to ship humans, was it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Of course not. The Church has never had to ship humans, so it was modified from a cargo container.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Naturally, it won't be quite as comfortable, but don't worry, I've mounted an AC system in there.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'That will do. I consider myself lucky to have gotten a ride at all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'And I have both of you to thank for this, Zavier and Mr. Trailblazer.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'That sounds a bit odd. Just call me Blaze.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Of course. Mr... Blaze?', 4: '1'}
{3: "A figure moves toward the group from the other end of the Church's helipad."}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Thank goodness, I made it...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "What's the matter?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "There's something I have to do in Kowloong. Please allow me to go with you.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Hey, Spooner, you're going to Kowloong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'One of my friends left for Kowloong before I joined the Church and I want to bring him back.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Did you talk to Arcana? Gear still needs your help with building the infrastructure, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "I've already brought her up to speed on the Church's affairs right after I learned Hanying was leaving.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Arcana told me to let Zero take over my work for now, and... now that Cervantes is back...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Spooner now speaks in a pleading tone.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "That's true. Spooner handled most of the construction work at the Church while Cervantes was away.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "I'll take over for Spooner. It's not going to end well if we let Zero handle it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "We should be good to go, then? But I guess we need to ask Hanying and Blaze if they're fine with it...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "I'm perfectly fine with that. Mr. Blaze?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: "I've got sufficient fuel reserve, so I think I should be okay.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Thanks for your help, Blaze.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Ready, everyone? Hang on tight!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab'}
{3: 'A loud rumble rolls through the helipad before a streak of white smoke shoots through the azure sky beyond the Church.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'May you find the meaning you have been searching for in the conscious world, Hanying.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '??', 3: '...What about my request?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: 'You are free to do as you please, as long as it follows the route.', 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Humph, sure. We might just see "Justice" back at the Church if anything goes south. And these... I can totally see "Hierophant" interested in these things.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Remember, there are no secrets at the Church of Machina.'}
